name: query_file_with_sql
description: Execute an SQL-like query on a local data file (CSV, Excel, JSON, or JSONL), with optional result export.

file_path.description: Path to the input data file. Supported formats: .csv, .xlsx, .xls, .json, .jsonl

sql_query.description: SQL query to run on the file. The table name must match the `table_name` parameter (default is 'data').

table_name.description: Name of the in-memory table to create from the file for SQL querying.

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index to load when the input is an Excel file. Ignored for other formats.

output_path.description: Optional path to save the query result. Supported formats: .csv, .xlsx, .json, .jsonl
